SEARCH
Package AntWorld

Class Anthill

java.lang.Object
AntWorld.Vertex
AntWorld.Anthill
public class Anthill extends Vertex
This class represents an anthill in the ant world. It extends the Vertex class and has an additional attribute for the amount of food.

  • Constructor Details

    • Anthill

      public Anthill(String name, double x, double y)
      The constructor for the Anthill class. It initializes the anthill with a name and location (x, y). The number of larvae is set to 0 and the amount of food is also set to 0.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the anthill.
      x - The x-coordinate of the anthill's location.
      y - The y-coordinate of the anthill's location.
